detail_desc: Knee-length wrap dress in a cotton weave. Collar, V-neck, tie around the waist, concealed press-stud at the front and a rounded hem.
Biker jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped front pockets, a zip at the cuffs and raw, frayed edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

prod_name: Jade Trash HW Skinny Denim TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.

Fitted coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Adjustable tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Double-layered hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Wide, ankle-length culottes in linen with patch side pockets and a high, frill-trimmed waist with covered elastication.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in stretch, coated denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Sleeveless V-neck top in soft jersey with twisted shoulder straps and decorative gathers at the front.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up and a silicone appliqué at the front.
Top in soft jersey with a lace top layer at the front and short cap sleeves.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, stretch cotton jersey. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Straight-cut bottoms with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.

Off-the-shoulder cotton poplin top with a unique nursing feature, smocking at the top, shoulder straps and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Short-sleeved top in satin with a lace yoke and round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Mesh bikini briefs with decorative trims, a mid waist and lined gusset. Narrow sides, high-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have elastication around the openings and a concealed silicone trim around the heel for best fit.
Playsuit in an airy weave with wide lace trims. Flared, 3/4-length sleeves, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and an elasticated seam at the waist. Short, wrapover legs. Unlined.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with lace details and a flounce at the front that continue over the sleeves. Ribbing at the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck and V-shaped opening. Unlined.
Slides with a large bow at the front, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cargo trousers in twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, one back pocket and a flap leg pocket. Low crotch and tapered legs.
Long, wrapover skirt in a viscose weave with ties at one side and a concealed fastening at the other. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Joggers in cotton denim with jersey-covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake diagonal front pockets and ribbed jersey hems.

Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, lined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support, and narrow shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back. Wide elastication at the hem.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a faux fur pompom on the top and sewn-in turn-up at the hem with an appliqué.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbing at the cuffs.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and straight hems.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Relaxed, straight fit with a gathered seam and flared flounce at the hem.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Short skirt in imitation suede with a high waist and concealed zip. Unlined.
Shirt dress in an airy viscose weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button. Seam under the bust and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Platform pool shoes with a wide elastic strap over the foot and fluted soles. Platform front 4.5 cm. Platform back 7 cm.
Knee-length dress in pleated chiffon with narrow shoulder straps and a narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a foldover shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Padded gilet with a detachable, faux-fur trimmed hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, side pocket and imitation leather details. Lined.
Cropped top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Raw-edge hem. Lightly brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with gathered elastication front and back for a draped effect. Square neckline and short puff sleeves with covered elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Lined.
Fully lined, smocked bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.

Three-piece suit set with a jacket, T-shirt and pair of trousers. Jacket and trousers in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend. Jacket with lapels, buttons at the front, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. T-shirt in cotton jersey with buttons on one shoulder and a contrasting colour chest pocket.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in microfibre with lace details, opening, lightly padded cups with space for nursing pads, side support, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Chinos in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Short-sleeved dress in a rib knit.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a draped knot detail at the hem.
Trainers in nylon and imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and patterned soles.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and a slightly shorter front with a tie detail at the hem.
Sleeveless body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Low-cut neckline front and back, wide shoulder straps, decorative buttons at the front and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.

Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and long sleeves. Opening at the back with a concealed zip at the bottom and a concealed button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a fitted skirt.
Top in soft, airy, fine-knit, gently draping fabric with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in a patterned weave with a frilled V-neck collar, buttons at the top, concealed zip in the side and a seam at the waist with a gently draped skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees.
Lightly padded jacket in felted fabric with a quilted lining. Faux fur collar with adjustable tabs and metal buckles, a zip down the front, and welt side pockets.
Cardigan in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders and no buttons.
Short top in soft, printed jersey with short sleeves and ties at the hem.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and patch front pockets.

Short-sleeved shirt in patterned cotton chambray with a turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with flutter sleeves in a broderie anglaise weave. Picot trim around the neckline and the lapped shoulders, and press-studs at the crotch.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, press-studs down the front and along one leg, short sleeves and short legs.
Oversized top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Fully lined, ribbed sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a deep V-neck and removable inserts that shape the bust. Wide, elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide, covered elastication at the hem. Light support.
Cap in a marled weave with an appliqué at the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Hair set with two plastic clips, two elastics and ten hair grips.

Bras in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace details and underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Short dress in soft velour with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Tube scarf in soft, warming fleece with a drawstring at the top. Slightly longer at the front. The polyester content of the scarf is partly recycled.
Top in soft jersey with beaded embroidery at the top, shoulder pads and short sleeves.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
